trans-unit.source: Describes the behavior that caused a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Descreve o comportamento que causou um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> eventos para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Os botões de página não ficam visíveis como botões, mas ocupam espaço entre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controlos em cada extremidade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador clica num botão de página, ao clicar no botão esquerdo do rato entre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button.
trans-unit.target: O resultado desta ação é mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>na direção do botão da página.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o efeito dos botões de página, consulte as descrições dos membros LargeIncrement e LargeDecrement.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra os elementos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, incluindo os botões de página.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: ![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")
trans-unit.target: ![As diferentes partes de uma barra de deslocamento](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "as diferentes partes de uma barra de deslocamento")

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> foi arrastou para uma nova posição e já não é agora está a ser arrastadas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*>posicionar do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando as chaves CTRL + HOME são premidas.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este movimento corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"> </xref> num vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"> </xref> num horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> mover uma distância especificada, conforme determinado pelo valor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, à esquerda para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou ascendente para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando o botão da página que é superior a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é premido ou quando a chave de segurança de página é premida e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando a página no botão para a esquerda do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é premido e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> mover uma distância especificada, conforme determinado pelo valor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, para a direita para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou descendente para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando o botão da página que é inferior a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é premido ou quando é premida a chave de página para baixo e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando a página no botão à direita do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é premido e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>posicionar do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando o CTRL + END ARROW são premidas.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este movimento corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"> </xref> num vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"> </xref> num horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> mover uma distância pequena, conforme determinado pelo valor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, à esquerda para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou ascendente para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the upper <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando o limite superior <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é premido ou quando é premida a tecla de seta para cima e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the left <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando a esquerda <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é premido e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> mover uma distância pequena, conforme determinado pelo valor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, para a direita para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou descendente para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the lower <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando o inferior <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é premido ou quando é premida a tecla de seta para baixo e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the right <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, este movimento ocorre quando o direito <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é premido e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movidas para uma nova posição porque o utilizador selecionado **deslocamento aqui** no menu de atalho a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este movimento corresponde do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para visualizar o menu de atalho, clique com botão direito do rato quando o ponteiro é efetuada através de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged and caused a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> foi arrastadas e causou um <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event of this ScrollEventType may occur more than one time when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is dragged in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> eventos deste ScrollEventType podem ocorrer mais do que uma hora em que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é arrastada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
